scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Comprises primarily newspaper clippings, 2011-2014. Also includes a few clippings, 1947-1978; school directories, 1946-1950; two trophies (Kentucky high school basketball tournament champions, 1919 and 1922); blue felt tip pen, "1983 state basketball champions;" yellow t-shirt square with Henry Clay Blue Devils logo and name; program for "The King and I," 1995; handwritten "criteria for a good teacher," written on back of a mimeographed note to Senior Home Rooms; and correspondence about the Henry Clay Archives. (1.7 cubic feet: 1 slim document box; 1 paper box)
